fields.name: nullable
fields.title: Nullable
fields.description: Indicates whether this field is nullable or not. The default value is true.

fields.name: many
fields.title: Many
fields.description: Indicates whether this field defines a many-to-many association. The default value is false

fields.name: expandable
fields.title: Expandable
fields.description: Indicates whether this field is expandable or not. The default value is false.

fields.name: nested
fields.title: Nested
fields.description: Indicates whether this field may hold a nested object or not. The default value is false.

fields.name: readonly
fields.title: Readonly
fields.description: Indicates whether this field is readonly or not. The default value is false

fields.name: value
fields.title: Default Value
fields.description: Defines the default value for this field, if any

fields.name: calculation
fields.title: Calculated Value
fields.description: Defines the calculated value for this field, if any

fields.name: derivedFrom
fields.title: Derived From
fields.description: Defines the model where this field actually belongs.

constraints.name: UniqueModelField
constraints.description: A field must be unique for each model
